description: This Java source file defines the ConversionService class, a core component responsible for handling conversion requests, fetching content, parsing it into a graph, and storing the results within a backend application using Spring Framework annotations.

classes.name: ConversionService
classes.description: Service class in Spring responsible for processing conversion requests by fetching content, parsing it into graph structures, and managing job statuses.

methods.name: startConversion
methods.description: Initiates a conversion process synchronously, generating a job ID, resolving content from either direct input or URL, parsing it, and updating the job store with results or errors.

methods.name: resolveContent
methods.description: Internal utility method that fetches content either directly from the request if provided, or via HTTP request from the specified URL.
